title: Shanghai update problem? ### BAD BLOCK ### Block: 17034870 (0x57f77052f67cdbdb14987b46d3a2d6f001dee0e974cb21da7f59c6dea4ad39c7)
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.11.5-stable-a38f4108
CL client & version: Lighthouse v3.1.0-aa022f4
OS & Version: Ubuntu 22.04

#### Expected behaviour

That the node continue syncing past block 17034869

#### Actual behaviour

Stuck at 17034869, calls 17034870 a "bad block":
```
########## BAD BLOCK #########
Block: 17034870 (0x57f77052f67cdbdb14987b46d3a2d6f001dee0e974cb21da7f59c6dea4ad39c7)
Error: missing withdrawalsHash
Platform: geth (devel) go1.20.2 amd64 linux
VCS: a38f4108-20230321
Chain config: &params.ChainConfig{ChainID:1, HomesteadBlock:1150000, DAOForkBlock:1920000, DAOForkSupport:true, EIP150Block:2463000, EIP150Hash:0x2086799aeebeae135c246c65021c82b4e15a2c451340993aacfd2751886514f0, EIP155Block:2675000, EIP158Block:2675000, ByzantiumBlock:4370000, ConstantinopleBlock:7280000, PetersburgBlock:7280000, IstanbulBlock:9069000, MuirGlacierBlock:9200000, BerlinBlock:12244000, LondonBlock:12965000, ArrowGlacierBlock:13773000, GrayGlacierBlock:15050000, MergeNetsplitBlock:<nil>, ShanghaiTime:(*uint64)(0xc00012e190), CancunTime:(*uint64)(nil), PragueTime:(*uint64)(nil), TerminalTotalDifficulty:58750000000000000000000, TerminalTotalDifficultyPassed:true, Ethash:(*params.EthashConfig)(0x2b77940), Clique:(*params.CliqueConfig)(nil)}
Receipts: 
##############################
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

geth has been running fine / didn't touch anything
